title: The following uses and accessory uses to the principal use shall be permitted in buildings or premis
clause_text: The following uses and accessory uses to the principal use shall be permitted in buildings or premises in purely Residential Zone, subject to other regulations:- Hostels for students / working men/ women, lodging with or without boarding facilities. Old age home, sanatorium, orphanage, night shelter dormitories.

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
